articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Celine Dion makes live comeback at Paris Olympics opening ceremony - BBC.com
articles.description: It's the superstar singer's first performance since revealing a serious health condition two years ago.
articles.content:
Dion has a big following in France. Her 1995 album D'eux is the best-selling French-language album of all time.
Friday's appearance was the second time that Dion, known for hits including My Heart W… [+656 chars]
